Name: Behind Border Zone
About the game: Behind Border Zone is a PC VR game with Oculus support, in which the player has the opportunity to receive an immersive experience in three different worlds. The player will have to visit the past, where he will play as a pirate looking for treasures that are guarded by an ancient evil. You will find yourself on an uninhabited beautiful island, on which, in the dense jungle, countless treasures are hidden. Use the map to find these treasures! However, remember that an ancient evil that takes the form of a terrible monster guards these treasures. Have time to find the treasure before the monster finds you. . The player will visit a haunted house in the twentieth century. The house where the ghost of a little girl lives. The ghost will make different puzzles and give tasks. You have to find out the history of this girl and understand whether you will beware of her, or other sinister inhabitants of this house. Solve all the puzzles and get out of there alive! . And also in the future, in the distant 25th century, where he will have to make his way through the floating city of a transformer teeming with flying cars. The third story will take you to the distant future, where people live high in the sky in transformer cities. Arm yourself with a futuristic pistol, use city-transforming levers, and make your way to the Last Resort. Shoot, solve puzzles, make your way through the wilds of the future! . Dare on and come in.
